last_episode_to_air.name: The Promise
last_episode_to_air.overview: Raylan, Boyd, and Ava fight one last, bloody battle to find out who leaves Harlan alive.

name: Justified
overview: A character drama based on the 2001 Elmore Leonard short story "Fire in the Hole." Leonard's tale centers around U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens of Kentucky, a quiet but strong-willed official of the law. The tale covers his high-stakes job, as well as his strained relationships with his ex-wife and father.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Deputy Marshal Raylan Givens is exiled to his hometown in Harlan County, Kentucky after the shooting of a Miami drug cartel hitman raises debate over Givens' renegade style of law enforcement. It isn't long before the people he left behind begin to surface in the most unexpected ways.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In the aftermath of the deadly showdown that freed Harlan County from the Crowder crime family reign, Raylan must now take on even greater criminal forces looking to seize power—including hell-bent nemesis Boyd Crowder and brutal new adversary Mags Bennett.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Surrounded by dirty politicians, drug cartels, murder frames, hidden fortunes and multiple criminal forces warring for control—including archenemies Boyd Crowder and Dickie Bennett, a mystery man named "Limehouse", a lethal mob enforcer newly arrived from Motor City, and his own father—Raylan finds himself in everyone's crosshairs.

episodes.name: Fire in the Hole
episodes.overview: Gunslinging U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens faces off against his oldest friend in Harlan, Kentucky, a 21st Century Wild West.

episodes.name: Riverbrook
episodes.overview: Raylan hunts an escaped prisoner who is determined to reunite with his ex-wife...and his stashed fortune.

episodes.name: Fixer
episodes.overview: In tracking a vanished confidential informant, Raylan goes against a pair of violent ex-cons who are just dying for a showdown with "The Kentucky Cowboy."

episodes.name: Long in the Tooth
episodes.overview: Raylan leaves to California to follow the trails of a criminal who has evaded him twice in the past, and Raylan is determined that the third time won't be the same.

episodes.name: The Lord of War and Thunder
episodes.overview: Raylan's father is arrested in the wake of a confrontation with the tenant of a house he and Raylan's stepmother own.

episodes.name: The Collection
episodes.overview: After an apparent suicide on an opulent Kentucky horse farm, Raylan must resist the sexy widow as he searches for the dead man's missing art.

episodes.name: Blind Spot
episodes.overview: Raylan foils an attempt on Ava's life and vows to find out who was behind it. Later, Raylan finds out that Ava may not have been the target.

episodes.name: Blowback
episodes.overview: When a murderous inmate takes hostages, Raylan must scramble to defuse the situation before the bullets start flying.

episodes.name: Hatless
episodes.overview: Raylan has a few drinks and gets himself beaten up, after being suspended as a Marshall. He pulls himself together and decides to jeopardise his career further by going after the thugs who have been harassing his ex-wife's new husband.

episodes.name: The Hammer
episodes.overview: Determined to repair the damage he's done, Raylan takes time away from his assignment bodyguarding an eccentric judge to track down an old lead.

episodes.name: Veterans
episodes.overview: When Boyd Crowder and his crusaders become vigilantes, Raylan takes it upon himself to try to shut them down.

episodes.name: Fathers and Sons
episodes.overview: In order to work for the Marshal's Office, Raylan's dad Arlo agrees to become a double agent and work for Bo Crowder. Meanwhile, Bo sets up a meth lab to get back in business.

episodes.name: Bulletville
episodes.overview: In the season finale, things come to a head in Harlan when the worlds of Raylan, Boyd and Bo Crowder collide.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Deputy Marshal Raylan Givens is exiled to his hometown in Harlan County, Kentucky after the shooting of a Miami drug cartel hitman raises debate over Givens' renegade style of law enforcement. It isn't long before the people he left behind begin to surface in the most unexpected ways.

episodes.name: The Moonshine War
episodes.overview: Raylan tangles with a ruthless Harlan County crime family while hunting for a fugitive sex offender.

episodes.name: The Life Inside
episodes.overview: Raylan chases a pregnant fugitive who has fallen into the hands of human traffickers.

episodes.name: The I of the Storm
episodes.overview: The hijacking of a bus full of drugs ends in murder, and Raylan pursues the likely culprit: Boyd Crowder.

episodes.name: For Blood or Money
episodes.overview: When Rachel's brother-in-law makes a violent escape from a halfway house, Raylan is forced to hunt him down. Boyd entertains a dangerous offer in Harlan.

episodes.name: Cottonmouth
episodes.overview: Raylan's hunt for a killer puts him on a collision course with the Bennett clan, while Boyd plots a heist with treacherous new partners.

episodes.name: Blaze of Glory
episodes.overview: When a terminally ill ex-con is linked to a bank heist, Art and Raylan must find him before he and his young henchmen can strike again. However, the manhunt is complicated when Winona worries that a hundred-dollar bill she took from an evidence room locker will be traced back to her after it is taken in the robbery.

episodes.name: Save My Love
episodes.overview: Winona's blunder could put her behind bars, unless Raylan can weave his way through a federal courthouse locked down over death threats.

episodes.name: The Spoil
episodes.overview: Raylan is assigned to protect a local coal mine executive as she tries to buy up land for the company but faces opposition from the Bennett clan.

episodes.name: Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: Just as the bad blood between the Bennetts and the coal company threatens to boil over, Raylan must thwart one of Mags' sons.

episodes.name: Debts and Accounts
episodes.overview: Raylan and Winona's idyll is shattered by violence, as Boyd and the Bennetts struggle to rise from the ashes of chaos in Harlan.

episodes.name: Full Commitment
episodes.overview: Raylan realizes he wasn't the sole target of an attempted assassination, and confronts the unlikely culprit once and for all.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.overview: A deadly home invasion hits Raylan personally, placing him in a race with Boyd and Arlo to find the killer. Mags is forced to make decisions about her involvement in the Bennett family's criminal activities and the fate of Dickie, who has a deadly plan to absolve himself of responsibility.

episodes.name: Bloody Harlan
episodes.overview: The Crowder and the Bennett clans go to war over control of Harlan, a move that leaves dead and dying on both sides.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In the aftermath of the deadly showdown that freed Harlan County from the Crowder crime family reign, Raylan must now take on even greater criminal forces looking to seize power—including hell-bent nemesis Boyd Crowder and brutal new adversary Mags Bennett.

episodes.name: The Gunfighter
episodes.overview: The arrival of a Detroit mobster in Lexington puts Raylan on a collision course with a sadistic Dixie Mafia hit man. Raylan also has another altercation with Boyd.

episodes.name: Cut Ties
episodes.overview: The murder of a fellow marshal throws Raylan together with a former female colleague, and Art leaves the office to track down another angle of the case. Meanwhile, Boyd engineers a showdown with Dickie Bennett, despite Raylan's effort to prevent it.

episodes.name: Harlan Roulette
episodes.overview: Raylan faces off with a tyrannical Oxy dealer, putting him on a collision course with the new head of the Dixie Mafia. Meanwhile, Boyd fights to regain part of his family's empire, but his methods could rip his crew apart.

episodes.name: The Devil You Know
episodes.overview: A daring prison escape puts Raylan on the trail of two old foes. Meanwhile, Boyd confronts a traitor in his inner circle.

episodes.name: Thick as Mud
episodes.overview: Raylan races to save Dewey Crowe from a gang of vicious organ harvesters. Boyd faces off with a new adversary.

episodes.name: When the Guns Come Out
episodes.overview: As Boyd fights for control of the Harlan oxy trade, Raylan works to keep the battle from becoming an all-out war while also battling a personal issue.

episodes.name: The Man Behind the Curtain
episodes.overview: Raylan's tactics put him at odds with the FBI as he intensifies his efforts to take down Quarles and the Detroit mob.

episodes.name: Watching the Detectives
episodes.overview: A shocking murder forces Raylan to face past mistakes. Meanwhile, Boyd goes up against Harlan's corrupt sheriff.

episodes.name: Loose Ends
episodes.overview: Raylan pursues a Dixie Mafia soldier who could be the key to nabbing Quarles; Ava protects an imperiled prostitute by any means necessary.

episodes.name: Guy Walks Into a Bar
episodes.overview: Raylan struggles to keep Dickie Bennett in prison while contending with an increasingly violent and unpredictable Quarles.

episodes.name: Measures
episodes.overview: Raylan squares off with a pair of merciless Detroit hit men. The battle between Boyd and Quarles comes to a head.

episodes.name: Coalition
episodes.overview: While Raylan closes in on an ever-more-unpredictable Quarles, Boyd enters into an unlikely alliance with Dickie Bennett in a last-ditch attempt to recover Mags's fortune.

episodes.name: Slaughterhouse
episodes.overview: After the murder of his friend, Raylan is a man on fire as he goes after any- and everyone he holds responsible on the way to a bloody final showdown.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Surrounded by dirty politicians, drug cartels, murder frames, hidden fortunes and multiple criminal forces warring for control—including archenemies Boyd Crowder and Dickie Bennett, a mystery man named "Limehouse", a lethal mob enforcer newly arrived from Motor City, and his own father—Raylan finds himself in everyone's crosshairs.

episodes.name: Hole in the Wall
episodes.overview: Raylan turns to affable but inexperienced Constable Bob for help securing a bail jumper from Tennessee.

episodes.name: Where's Waldo?
episodes.overview: As Raylan tangles with a dangerous family keeping a dark secret, Boyd takes on a snake-handling preacher.

episodes.name: Truth and Consequences
episodes.overview: Drew Thompson's widow turns up and gets Raylan in hot water with the FBI, while Boyd's strike at the snake church is met with a surprising strike back.

episodes.name: This Bird Has Flown
episodes.overview: Raylan's hunt for his stolen money leads to a confrontation with a bareknuckle brawler; while Boyd and Ava face a decision that threatens to destroy them.

episodes.name: Kin
episodes.overview: The search for Drew Thompson leads Raylan into the remote wilds of Kentucky hill country with unexpected and dangerous results.

episodes.name: Foot Chase
episodes.overview: Raylan's discovery of a severed foot sets off a race against time, while Boyd and Ava work to break into Harlan high society.

episodes.name: Money Trap
episodes.overview: Raylan finds himself caught between a foxy grifter and an old nemesis out for revenge, while Boyd and Ava come face-to-face with the decadence of Harlan's elite.

episodes.name: Outlaw
episodes.overview: Bodies start dropping and no one is safe as the search for Drew Thompson enters its home stretch.

episodes.name: The Hatchet Tour
episodes.overview: Boyd discovers he still has an Ellen-May problem, while Raylan goes off-book to do some dynamite-fishing with unexpected results.

episodes.name: Get Drew
episodes.overview: Drew Thompson slips through the fingers of Raylan, Boyd, and the Detroit mob, and sets off a breakneck race to find him.

episodes.name: Decoy
episodes.overview: Boyd and the gang from Detroit Mob use dirty tricks to keep Raylan and Drew Thompson alive.

episodes.name: Peace of Mind
episodes.overview: The Drew Thompson case becomes a fiasco that Raylan can fix only by besting Boyd in a hunt for the unwitting woman caught in the middle.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: Raylan has a last, lethal showdown with the Detroit mob, while Boyd and Ava try to keep an incriminating secret dead and buried.

episodes.name: A Murder of Crowes
episodes.overview: Raylan travels to Florida to deal with the CROWE family; Boyd goes to Detroit in search of a missing shipment of drugs.

guest_stars.character: Chief Deputy U.S. Marshal Dan Grant
guest_stars.name: Matt Craven

episodes.name: The Kids Aren't All Right
episodes.overview: Dewey's ruthless cousin Darryl descends upon Harlan, as Raylan tries to undo a young friend's unfortunate mess, and Boyd struggles to free Ava from jail.

guest_stars.character: Chief Deputy U.S. Marshal Ed Kirkland
guest_stars.name: Shashawnee Hall

episodes.name: Good Intentions
episodes.overview: Raylan is king for a day in the seized mansion of a notorious mob accountant, while Boyd tries to regain his stranglehold on the Harlan heroin market.

episodes.name: Over the Mountain
episodes.overview: Raylan ventures into wild country on the hunt for a missing informant, while Boyd's last living relative threatens his life and livelihood.

guest_stars.character: Chief Deputy U.S. Marshal Ed Kirkland
guest_stars.name: Shashawnee Hall

episodes.name: Shot All to Hell
episodes.overview: Raylan's secrets are at stake when a mob revenge plot descends upon Kentucky, and Boyd's recent successes are tempered by a crushing defeat.

episodes.name: Kill the Messenger
episodes.overview: An attack on Alison sends Raylan to Harlan in search of payback, while Boyd scrambles to arrange protection for Ava.

episodes.name: Raw Deal
episodes.overview: Boyd and the Crowes fly South for a crucial drug score, while Raylan pursues a small time grifter with big time enemies.

episodes.name: Whistle Past the Graveyard
episodes.overview: Raylan chases a missing Crowe, while Boyd and his new partners fight their way back across the border.

episodes.name: Wrong Roads
episodes.overview: Raylan partners with a maverick DEA agent whose bad behavior feels uncomfortably familiar, while Boyd makes a hard choice to protect Ava.

episodes.name: Weight
episodes.overview: Raylan and Boyd collide on the hunt for Dewey Crowe, while bad blood simmering in the Crowe family finally boils over.

episodes.name: The Toll
episodes.overview: A shooting close to home forces Raylan and Boyd to decide which lines they're willing to cross.

episodes.name: Starvation
episodes.overview: Raylan puts pressure on every criminal in town as a ploy to arrest Darryl Crowe Jr., while Boyd and Duffy enlist an unlikely ally to fight off cartel killers.

episodes.name: Restitution
episodes.overview: Raylan has one last shot at taking down Art's would-be assassin, while cartel killers have Boyd's back against the wall.

episodes.name: Fate's Right Hand
episodes.overview: Raylan guides Ava through the process of informing on Boyd and tries to turn Boyd's old ally Dewey Crowe against him as well, all while Boyd works to pull off a daring heist right under Raylan's nose.

episodes.name: Cash Game
episodes.overview: Raylan's investigation brings him into conflict with a paramilitary outfit, while Boyd and his partners try to salvage a profit from their heist.

episodes.name: Noblesse Oblige
episodes.overview: Raylan follows a trail of illegal explosives in an attempt to pin Boyd, who discovers he's run afoul of a dangerous new player in town.

episodes.name: The Trash and the Snake
episodes.overview: Raylan declares war on the deadly men who are forcing Harlan's most valuable real estate to change hands, while Boyd and Duffy seek out a crackpot safecracker to help do their dirty work.

episodes.name: Sounding
episodes.overview: When Ava makes a drastic decision, Raylan turns to an old friend for help. A suspicious Duffy looks into Ava’s release from prison.

episodes.name: Alive Day
episodes.overview: Raylan investigates a murder that has sown discord in Markham's camp. Boyd's latest heist forces him to revisit his mining days.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.overview: A visit from his baby daughter threatens to pull Raylan away from the hunt for a dangerous fugitive. Boyd, having learned that Ava's been lying to him, takes her on a hunting trip that she may never come back from.

episodes.name: Dark as a Dungeon
episodes.overview: Raylan extends an unexpected offer to Markham. Boyd and Ava find themselves in Walker’s dangerous company.

episodes.name: Burned
episodes.overview: Raylan and Boyd each test Ava's loyalty, and Markham's plans to win over Harlan go awry.

episodes.name: Trust
episodes.overview: As Raylan puts more pressure on his CIs, Boyd makes a move on Markham’s money, and Ava finds herself caught in the crossfire again.

episodes.name: Fugitive Number One
episodes.overview: Raylan and the Marshals scramble to deal with a crisis that threatens all of their careers. Duffy, Mike, and Katherine question the meaning of loyalty.

episodes.name: Collateral
episodes.overview: Raylan and Boyd’s paths cross as they search for Ava in the mountains. Markham recruits an unlikely ally to his cause.

episodes.name: The Promise
episodes.overview: Raylan, Boyd, and Ava fight one last, bloody battle to find out who leaves Harlan alive.
